callout.title: TransactSmart
description: We are a VISA and MasterCard principal member, payment card acquirer, processor, and cash register developer and service provider.

Designed for small and medium enterprises, this solution offers everything a  merchant needs to start selling: an integrated cash register certified with tax  authorities, inventory management, built-in bank card acceptance, and more — all within a single, straightforward agreement.

sunmiP2.bgImageAlt: Background image for Sunmi P2 section

p: Step into the future of retail with the Sunmi P2, a next-generation POS system that  merges power and elegance in a compact, handheld design. With its intuitive interface  and lightning-fast performance, the Sunmi P2 transforms every transaction into a  smooth, effortless experience. Elevate your business with the Sunmi P2, where  innovation meets the art of simplicity.

deviceCahierSystem.bgImageAlt: Background image for Device and Cashier System section

ul.text: Portable and secure Android-based device with a strong battery.
Online connectivity via telecom providers or Wi-Fi.
Allows quick and simple selling of goods and services by entering a price or selecting items from inventory.
Compliant with fiscal laws and certifications.
Integrated with tax authorities' fiscal servers for online fiscalization.
Bank card payment acceptance—enables payments on the same device using Mastercard and VISA.
Cash register connected with the payment application, requiring the amount to be entered only once.
Device prints both fiscal and bank receipts for clients.
Certified with acquirer—no additional certification needed. Simply sign a contract with the acquirer and service company, Transact Pro, for the complete solution.
